I was reading about this
http://www.umiacs.umd.edu/~vikas/Current_research/=
scalable_machine_learn
ing/scalable_machine_learning.html

Apparently what =
I glossed from it. Is that it is a O(n) training 
algorithm for large data =
sets. 

Could we apply this to NEAT to help refine the weights. Or possibly=
 
even evolve the topology with NEAT and refine the weights with it?


--Sh=
